messages.content: Take each letter of the alphabet and generate a word for it

Here are words for each letter of the alphabet:

A - Apple
B - Banana
C - Cat
D - Dog
E - Elephant
F - Fish
G - Giraffe
H - Hippopotamus
I - Ice cream
J - Jaguar
K - Kangaroo
L - Lion
M - Mouse
N - Nose
O - Octopus
P - Pineapple
Q - Quail
R - Rat
S - Snake
T - Tiger
U - Umbrella
V - Violin
W - Watermelon
X - Xylophone
Y - Yellow
Z - Zebra
Write an acronym that spells the word BEAR

Here are a few acronyms that spell the word "BEAR":

1. Best Efforts Are Required
2. Bear Essential Adventure Regulations
3. Business, Engineering, Arts, and Research
4. Basic Environmental Awareness and Responsibility
